td.content: s:F care provider aged 60 yrs complains of Body Aches for 3 weeks. NKDA. she denies drinking alcohol she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 170 cm, Weight 91.7 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Doxycycline - 100 mg twice per day, and ordered Synovial fluid cell count panel.

td.content: s:61 YO female presents with 16 months history of Body Aches. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol denies any smoking o:Height 170 cm, Weight 94.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Doxycycline - 100 mg twice per day, and ordered Lyme IgM antibody.
